column2: Looks as if Chauvin is a serial suffocator.
column5: Looks as if Chauvin is a serial suffocator. Turns out he's done this before back in 2017. Late last year as a team of Minnesota state prosecutors was preparing for the trial that would ultimately convict former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin ofÂ murdering George Floyd they received a series of videos depicting Chauvin's handling of another case three years earlier that by their own description shocked them.
